answer:
In BC, protection against measles, mumps, rubella are given as a combination MMR vaccine. Combination vaccines are safe. Read more about vaccine safety here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## In BC, protection against measles, mumps, rubella are given as a combination MMR vaccine.

Combination vaccines are safe.
